div.p:
Dear Families of East Allen County Schools,
Following Governor Holcomb’s Press Conference this afternoon, April 2nd, East Allen County Schools will be closed through the end of this school year. The Governor announced that all schools in the state of Indiana will be closed through the remainder of the 2019 – 2020 school year. We will be using a combination of eLearning days and instructional waiver days from the Governor during this time period.

Attached you will see a calendar indicating which days will be electronic learning days and which days students will not be given assignments. All assignments from the previous week will be due each Monday by 4:00 p.m. with the exception of the last week when all assignments will be due by 4:00 p.m. on Friday, May 22.

If your student has difficulty accessing his or her eLearning assignments, he or she may contact their teachers by email. East Allen County Schools realizes that your child may not have reliable internet access. If that is the case, please contact the teachers in order to determine other options for completing the assignments. If you need further assistance, please feel free to call your child’s school. All school activities will be canceled during this time frame.

As further information becomes available, we will continue to communicate through the district website and school messenger. We know this is a stressful time and East Allen County Schools will continue to support our families with instruction. We encourage families to create a routine for their children and look for ways to support each other as we navigate the weeks ahead. As the Governor also indicated, social distancing is extremely important. Please discuss social distancing with your child in order to help decrease the spread of the virus. Finally, information regarding meal distribution can be found on our website and will be updated regularly.

Thank you so much for your patience and understanding during this time. Please reach out to me, if I can help in any possible way. More details will be forthcoming regarding retrieving student belongings and the returning of the iPads. We will also be sharing more information regarding seniors as it becomes available.

Marilyn Hissong,
Superintendent
EACS Calendar for March 16 - May 22, 2020

div.div: Due to the social distancing and stay at home orders the School Board meeting on April 21, 2020 will be held via Zoom. The link for the meeting is https://zoom.us/j/4491573073?pwd=bEhiU0Y3ZDlCSTYyOE5PYTZKN0o3Zz09.
div.a: Read More about School Board Meeting update

a.title: EACS Students Awarded State Future Indiana Teacher Scholarships

div.a: EACS Students Awarded State Future Indiana Teacher Scholarships
div.div: The Indiana Commission for Higher Education has awarded 200 scholarships to the fourth class of Next Generation Hoosier Educators. Selected through a competitive process based on academic achievement and other factors, recipients will receive $7,500 annually (up to $30,000 total) for committing to teach in Indiana for at least five years after graduating college.
div.a: Read More about EACS Students Awarded State Future Indiana Teacher Scholarships

div.div: If you are interested in touring an East Allen County School building to learn about a prospective school any day Monday through Friday, please contact the school(s) to schedule an appointment!
div.a: Read More about Future Families Tour a School!
